channel.title: Help with Sled Anim!
channel.description: Hey guys, so i was playing on some old server, and when i got onto a sled i'd stand on it, turn sideways and slide. Now, on my new one that i am making, i can only "use" it. i can't wield it or anything. how can i get the sled to go on my feet so i can slide on it?

item.title: Help with Sled Anim!
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

Hey guys,
so i was playing on some old server, and when i got onto a sled i’d stand on it, turn sideways and slide.
Now, on my new one that i am making, i can only “use” it. i can’t wield it or anything.
how can i get the sled to go on my feet so i can slide on it?

Read full topic
